author: oswald
title: Interaction with blockchain
description: In Africa, buy, sell, exchange the cryptos, NFTS ... remains a careless concern and carries a brake on the adoption
solution: We set up an ecosystem that facilitates interaction with Blockchain and its derivatives to anyone, particular or business, to boost adoption
experience: Our Token is in ico, and people buy directly from their mobile phone with local currencies from 5 countries in Africa via our payment tool
